body:
/kind bug
/area ipv6
/area ipvs
/sig network


**What happened**:

In an ipv6-only cluster the `kube-proxy` in `ipvs` mode creates a number of ipset's with `family inet`.

This causes problems and fault logs when they are used with ipv6 addresses.

**What you expected to happen**:

The ipset's should be created with `family inet6`.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:

* Start a ipv6-only cluster
* Execute; `ipset list` on any node and check the output

**Anything else we need to know?**:

The problem seems to be [here](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/5b2a7c7347cf9ca86ef5dfaaea3e3aa4df3ae270/pkg/proxy/ipvs/proxier.go#L379-L384)

This code seems pretty weird to me. I mean why a `isIpv6` flag in the `ipsetInfo` structure at all? I ignored the `isIpv6` flag in the structure and just passed the `isIpv6` in the `NewProxy()` directly to `NewIPSet()` and it seem to work.



**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
```
# kubectl version
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"12+", GitVersion:"v1.12.0-beta.0.381+b70f2bbc9fbf8d-dirty", GitCommit:"b70f2bbc9fbf8d5e1483d9f65da2c55abb1d1fa7", GitTreeState:"dirty", BuildDate:"2018-08-23T17:50:38Z", GoVersion:"go1.10.2", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"12+", GitVersion:"v1.12.0-beta.0.381+b70f2bbc9fbf8d-dirty", GitCommit:"b70f2bbc9fbf8d5e1483d9f65da2c55abb1d1fa7", GitTreeState:"dirty", BuildDate:"2018-08-23T17:50:38Z", GoVersion:"go1.10.2", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration:
  Kvm on Ubuntu 16.04
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release):
  Own BusyBox system
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`):
`Linux vm-001 4.17.13 #1 SMP Thu Aug 9 09:27:42 CEST 2018 x86_64 GNU/Linux`
- Install tools:
  None
- Others:

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Network.
labels.name: sig/network

title: Ipsets have family inet in an ipv6-only cluster for proxy-mode=ipvs
